item.title: Trump administration to close Miami organ donation group it calls 'failing'
item.description: The Trump administration is moving to shut down a Miami nonprofit that recovers organs from deceased donors

item.title: Trump administration's new global health aid strategy focuses on bilateral deals with countries
item.description: The State Department is refocusing its foreign health assistance programs around multiyear bilateral deals with recipient countries

item.title: Hyundai says it will spend $2.7 billion expanding the Georgia plant raided by ICE
item.description: Hyundai Motor Group confirms it's moving forward with expanding its Georgia plant
